General.Name: Spring Art Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Spring Art Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the design and development, manufacture, marketing, and sale of ready-to-assemble furniture products. It offers drawer chest; wardrobe; bookshelf; study table; TV and shoe cabinet; office, bedroom, living room; and other furniture. It sells its products in Africa, Asia Pacific, Europe, the Middle East, North America, Oceania, and Latin America. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Muar, Malaysia.
